body:
That's right you noobs! A full and complete guide to TNT cannons has been made! Go forth and have fun! Learn to cannon and spread word of the topic!

I am a bit tired of being one of the few people who know how to cannon on Avicus. It's time that we learned how to properly cannon.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1W-OlNuEIx0

Post screenies or vids of your successes!

True, but this one contains a full explanation of how to cannon. Like, building a cannon from the ground up and telling you how to use it and how not to be a complete noob with it xD

I'm assuming that you mean Varis's guide? If so, that is a showcase of different cannons. Not a tutorial unfortunately.

replies.body:
"I'm assuming that you mean Varis's guide? If so, that is a showcase of different cannons. Not a tutorial unfortunately."

Copied from my response to another. Can you guys just watch the video without pulling links from other places out of nowhere? I feel that practically a portion of you here actually bothered with the vid. Despite the work I put into the vid to get you guys to know how to cannon... it's annoying. 

I mean, the vid explains what each component of a cannon does... The different mount blocks and what their attributes are... Why water is needed... the different redstone signal blocks... The consequences of pushing the buttons of a cannon in the wrong order...

I already know about Varis's guide. I knew how to cannon before I read the topic. Please stop giving a link to it. It is seperate from Avicus. I made a guide for Avicus.  It is incredibly rude to put up a link to another topic. Even when that topic is like almost 2 years old. Stop.
